allow: Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command "& { $errors = $null; $null = [System.Management.Automation.Language.Parser]::ParseFile\(\(Resolve-Path ''Tests\\Portable.Tests.ps1''\).Path, [ref]$null, [ref]$errors\); if \($errors.Count -gt 0\) { $errors | ForEach-Object { Write-Host $_Message }; exit 1 } else { Write-Host ''Portable.Tests.ps1: Syntax OK'' } }")
